title: Mortality due to visceral leishmaniasis in Brazil by municipalities, 2001–2018: a spatial–temporal analysis of estimates from the Global Burden of Disease study
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 234

Author(s): R. Vieira-Duarte, V.E.M. de Araújo, G.A. Veloso, D.T. Cardoso, F.T.O. Ker, D.S. Barbosa, D.C. Malta, M. Nagavi, M. Carneiro, W. Coura-Vital
